item.title: Steve Jobs and Richard Stallman
item.description: Today, news broke about Richard Stallman’s comment on Steve Job’s death. The news of the giant’s passing has stirred up a wave of emotions ranging from utter sadness to feelings of empowerment to do great things. Tributes were paid to Steve Jobs all over the internet. His life is described as one of a genius. Technology celebrities have publicly commented on his death. Richard Stallman said the following: I’m not glad he’s dead, but I’m glad he’s gone.
